title: Some weird in-game stutter step issues unrelated to ping or fps?
body:
So say i am at point A, autopathing to point C, anywhere on the map, i am actually at point B 2-3 inches in front of my character model... 
(The best text diagram i can provide haha) 

A - - - - B - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - C


i didnt have this issue at all ever until today, turned my video settings to low and my fps to 60 still the same result without any frames/ping disturbance (60fps stable 28ms constant), still this strange stutter stepping, i asked around in all chat in the few games i have played today and only 2 said they werent experiencing the jumps, just wondering if anybody else is having problems like this? wondering if it might be server related on riots end?? thanks guys :)

EDIT: After a few more games still the same issue (on both rift and aram), some people reporting the same thing ingame... i have used ingame item cooldown pings to test if there is delay and it seems like im running 4 seconds behind with 28ms (redemption cooldown was 13s yet the chat ping said 9s) ill upload screenshots as i look into this further

replies.body: yep also feeling this, though not 4s for me, was actually 2s. It seems to crop up more if you have other applications accessing the internet running in the background though, so try to close all other programs whilst using league, including, steam, battle.net, skype, discord, ect.. It makes it a little smoother, though still not optimal.

trouble is i have nothing else open, i have played this game since season 3 and i havent seen this before, and ive used skype/discord/soundcloud music streams while playing constantly without this issue, game was running fine yesterday with music stream going too so im not sure :/ im going to do some tech stuff to my rig and modem now and restart and see if theres any difference fingers crossed
